basics.label: Developer
basics.name: Deepak George
basics.summary: I am a Graduate student in Business Analytics and Information Systems at the University of South Florida. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2018.

education.area: Business Analytics and Information System (expected Fall, 2018)
education.institution: University of South Florida, Tampa, Fl

work.company: University of South Florida, Tampa, Fl
highlights: Working on integrating the Web client with the Web-API based backend and enhancing UX & app features.
Building an AI agent for the instructors to guide students better with additional insights from text mining.
Working on developing analytical dashboards for students and instructors, for reviewing student progress.
Tools Used – C# ASP.NET, Entity Framework and DDD, JavaScript, JQuery and AJAX, RandLex
work.summary: Web Developer for the My Reviewers app, an online peer review and document markup tool built on ASP.NET

highlights: Analyzed customer data, device login records, and account activity data to profile users and transactions.

Built time-series, regression, NB and decision tree models to identify key variables to predict potential fraud in Mobile/ATM check deposits and documented and reported the results using visualization suites.
Built a highly flexible python-based ETL to synthesize complex variables for analysis and modelling.
Tools Used – Python, Pandas, Numpy, MS Excel and MS SQL Server, Tableau.
work.summary: Worked on predicting fraud in check transactions and reducing loss from consequential account charge-offs.

work.company: University of South Florida, Tampa, Fl
highlights: Prepared a highly-practical course material and instructed on topics covering the language’s features, the data munging and visualization abilities it offers along with data structures and algorithms.
work.summary: As an adjunct faculty for master’s students, hosted a 4-day Python Bootcamp for a class of 160 students.

highlights: Conceptualized and built a workflow-based solution for an American bank for fast and automated deployment of web pages onto application servers, using Java & TeamSite reducing deployment time by 80%.

Replaced existing SOAP-based web services with a RESTful web service for a leading UK-based insurance platform using JAX-RS and Java EE 8. The project development followed Agile methodology and Scrum.
work.summary: Worked as Java developer with major American and European banking clients, building custom web solutions.
